channel.title: Allstar v2 without Thread Per Client (reuploaded w/ fixed conventions)
channel.description:
[center]Allstarscape v2 but without thread per client [size=16pt]Credits:[/size]
The original developers of the source - (making it)
Graham Edgecombe - (thread per client removal tut + Task Scheduler)
Me - (Following the Thread Per Client tut, fixing bugs in it, adding task scheduler, releasing the source)
arham 4 - (Fixing conventions)
[size=16pt]Notes:[/size] This is still horrible, I urge you not to use it! But if you wish to use allstar I'd suggest this. A client I would suggest using is stabbingscape (if someone needs I'll upload) Might be a few bugs such as teleporting to default place or char files "not found" (not hard to fix I just quickly ran through and didn't check, but I did fix a few of those bugs) [size=16pt]Media (because I have to!):[/size] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/sndidj.png[/img] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?saekczgf4gmuuym][size=72pt]Download[/size][/url]

item.description:
@TheLetterQArousesMe wrote:

arham 4:

Where’s my fixed convention version q???

Added

JavaLearner:

Hey, atleast you gave Graham credits. This might come in handy for people who prefer to use Allstar but don’t have any coding experience. (A better base = a better server at the end)

The only thing he asked for was credits and yep, that’s why it’s here. Someone somewhere is going to decide to use Allstar and I hope they stumble across this when they do.

Read full topic

item.title: Allstar v2 without Thread Per Client (reuploaded w/ fixed conventions)
item.dc:creator: @TheLetterQArousesMe TheLetterQArousesMe
item.description:
@TheLetterQArousesMe wrote:

[quote=“Arcik, post:6, topic:506580”]I’m pretty sure Graham released a tutorial on this? Good job following it? :S

Edit: Didn’t read the thread before posting lol, you gave credits :)[/quote]

Yes but a large percentage of people who use Allstar don’t follow it. Plus there’s a few bugs which would make them revert to their backup

[quote=“Arcik, post:6, topic:506580”]I’m pretty sure Graham released a tutorial on this? Good job following it? :S

Edit: Didn’t read the thread before posting lol, you gave credits :)[/quote]

Most people who use Allstar probably back away from the tutorial when they see how big it is. And if you read above, there’s a few simple to fix bugs that they probably wouldn’t know how to fix, because they’re noobs

Sup22211:

I wont use it but can you upload some more pics? and allstar and delta always be a the top of my list

There’s no need for pics, just look at allstarscape pictures, the only thing I did was add task scheduler and remove thread per client. c:
Edit: You have some crappy servers at the top of your list

Read full topic
